ConditionOperator.description:
Comparator describes the type of comparison.

 - OPERATOR_UNSPECIFIED: The default value
 - OPERATOR_EQUALS: Verify if the property values are strictly equal or not.
 - OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN: Verify if the oracle data value is greater than the Condition value.
 - OPERATOR_GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL: Verify if the oracle data value is greater than or equal to the Condition
value.
 - OPERATOR_LESS_THAN: Verify if the oracle data value is less than the Condition value.
 - OPERATOR_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL: Verify if the oracle data value is less or equal to than the Condition
value.

MarketTradingMode.description:
- TRADING_MODE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value, this is invalid
 - TRADING_MODE_CONTINUOUS: Normal trading
 - TRADING_MODE_BATCH_AUCTION: Auction trading (FBA)
 - TRADING_MODE_OPENING_AUCTION: Opening auction
 - TRADING_MODE_MONITORING_AUCTION: Auction triggered by monitoring
MarketTradingMode.title: The trading mode the market is currently running, also referred to as 'market state'

VoteValue.description:
- VALUE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value, always invalid
 - VALUE_NO: A vote against the proposal
 - VALUE_YES: A vote in favour of the proposal
VoteValue.title: Vote value

operator.description: comparator is the type of comparison to make on the value.

value.description: value is used by the comparator.

v1Condition.title: Condition describes the condition that must be validated by the

key.description: key is the oracle data property key targeted by the filter.

conditions.description:
conditions are the conditions that should be matched by the data to be
considered of interest.

v1Filter.description:
Filter describes the conditions under which an oracle data is considered of
interest or not.

id.description: id is a hash generated from the OracleSpec data.

pub_keys.description:
pubKeys is the list of authorized public keys that signed the data for this
oracle. All the public keys in the oracle data should be contained in these
public keys.

filters.description:
filters describes which oracle data are considered of interest or not for
the product (or the risk model).

status.title: status describes the status of the oracle spec

v1OracleSpec.description:
An oracle spec describe the oracle data that a product (or a risk model)
wants to get from the oracle engine.
This message contains additional information used by the API.

pub_keys.description:
pubKeys is the list of authorized public keys that signed the data for this
oracle. All the public keys in the oracle data should be contained in these
public keys.

filters.description:
filters describes which oracle data are considered of interest or not for
the product (or the risk model).

v1OracleSpecConfiguration.description:
An oracle spec describe the oracle data that a product (or a risk model)
wants to get from the oracle engine.

v1OracleSpecStatus.description:
- STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: The default value.
 - STATUS_ACTIVE: STATUS_ACTIVE describes an active oracle spec.
 - STATUS_DEACTIVATED: STATUS_DEACTIVATED describes an oracle spec that is not listening to data
anymore.
v1OracleSpecStatus.title: Status describe the status of the oracle spec

name.description: name is the name of the property.

type.description: type is the type of the property.

v1PropertyKey.description: PropertyKey describes the property key contained in an oracle data.

v1PropertyKeyType.description:
Type describes the type of properties that are supported by the oracle
engine.

 - TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: The default value.
 - TYPE_EMPTY: Any type.
 - TYPE_INTEGER: Integer type.
 - TYPE_STRING: String type.
 - TYPE_BOOLEAN: Boolean type.
 - TYPE_DECIMAL: Any floating point decimal type.
 - TYPE_TIMESTAMP: Timestamp date type.

id.title: The internal ID for this staking event

ts.title: The timestamps at which the event was emitted by ethereum

party.description: The party to whom the event is directed at.

amount.title: The amount of stake deposited or removed

finalized_at.title: The time at which the vega network finalized the state of the event

tx_hash.title: The hash of the transaction from which the events happen

v1StakeLinking.title:
StakeLinking - an event notifying of stake being deposited or removed for a given party
These events are emitted for every Staking deposit or removed accepted by the network

v1StakeLinkingStatus.title:
- STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - STATUS_PENDING: Indicate an event waiting for confirmation from the vega network
 - STATUS_ACCEPTED: Indicate of an event accepted by the vega network
 - STATUS_REJECTED: Indaicate of an event rejected by the vega network

v1StakeLinkingType.title:
- TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - TYPE_LINK: Indicate of a stake deposit instruction
 - TYPE_UNLINK: Indicate of a stake remove instruction

vega_pub_key.title: Vega public key of validator node

ethereum_address.title: Ethereum public key of validator node

info_url.title: URL with more info on the node

country.title: Country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) for the location of the node

v1ValidatorUpdate.title: A validator update event contains information about validator node

details.title: The definition of the external source for this asset

vegaAsset.title: The Vega representation of an external asset

name.title: Name of the asset (e.g: Great British Pound)

total_supply.title: Total circulating supply for the asset

decimals.title: Number of decimal / precision handled by this asset

min_lp_stake.title: Min stake required for this asset from liquidity providers

vegaAssetDetails.title: The Vega representation of an external asset

duration.title: Duration of the auction in seconds

vegaAuctionDuration.title:
An auction duration is used to configure 3 auction periods:
1. `duration > 0`, `volume == 0`:
  The auction will last for at least N seconds
2. `duration == 0`, `volume > 0`:
  The auction will end once we can close with given traded volume
3. `duration > 0`, `volume > 0`:
  The auction will take at least N seconds, but can end sooner if we can trade a certain volume

vegaAuctionTrigger.description:
- AUCTION_TRIGGER_UNSPECIFIED: Default value for AuctionTrigger, no auction triggered
 - AUCTION_TRIGGER_BATCH: Batch auction
 - AUCTION_TRIGGER_OPENING: Opening auction
 - AUCTION_TRIGGER_PRICE: Price monitoring trigger
 - AUCTION_TRIGGER_LIQUIDITY: Liquidity monitoring trigger
vegaAuctionTrigger.title: Auction triggers indicate what condition triggered an auction (if market is in auction mode)

max_faucet_amount_mint.title: Maximum amount that can be requested by a party through the built-in asset faucet at a time

duration_ns.title: Duration in nanoseconds, maximum 1 month (2592000000000000 ns)

contract_address.title: The address of the contract for the token, on the ethereum network

vegaERC20.title: An ERC20 token based asset, living on the ethereum network

oracle_spec_for_settlement_price.title: The oracle spec describing the settlement price oracle filter

oracle_spec_for_trading_termination.title: the oracle spec describing the trading termination oracle filter

oracle_spec_binding.title: The binding between the oracle spec and the oracle data

oracle_spec_for_settlement_price.title: The oracle spec describing the oracle data of settlement price

oracle_spec_for_trading_termination.title: The oracle spec describing the oracle data of trading termination

oracle_spec_binding.title: The binding between the oracle spec and the settlement price

tags.title: A list of 0 or more tags

target_stake_parameters.title: Specifies parameters related to target stake calculation

triggering_ratio.title: Specifies the triggering ratio for entering liquidity auction

auction_extension.title: Specifies by how many seconds an auction should be extended if leaving the auction were to trigger a liquidity auction

vegaLiquidityMonitoringParameters.title: LiquidityMonitoringParameters contains settings used for liquidity monitoring

reference.title: The pegged reference point for the order

proportion.title: The relative proportion of the commitment to be allocated at a price level

offset.title: The offset/amount of units away for the order

equity_like_share.title: The share own by this liquidity provider (float)

average_entry_valuation.title: The average entry valuation of the liquidity provider for the market

vegaLiquidityProviderFeeShare.title: The equity like share of liquidity fee for each liquidity provider

vegaLogNormalModelParams.title: Risk model parameters for log normal

params.title: Risk model parameters for log normal

decimal_places.title:
Number of decimal places that a price must be shifted by in order to get a
correct price denominated in the currency of the market, for example:
`realPrice = price / 10^decimalPlaces`

opening_auction.title:
Auction duration specifies how long the opening auction will run (minimum
duration and optionally a minimum traded volume)

trading_mode.title: Current mode of execution of the market

market_timestamps.title: Timestamps for when the market stay changes

mark_price.title:
Mark price, as an integer, for example `123456` is a correctly
formatted price of `1.23456` assuming market configured to 5 decimal places

best_bid_price.title:
Highest price level on an order book for buy orders, as an integer, for example `123456` is a correctly
formatted price of `1.23456` assuming market configured to 5 decimal places

best_bid_volume.title: Aggregated volume being bid at the best bid price

best_offer_price.title: Lowest price level on an order book for offer orders

best_offer_volume.title:
Aggregated volume being offered at the best offer price, as an integer, for example `123456` is a correctly
 // formatted price of `1.23456` assuming market configured to 5 decimal places

best_static_bid_price.title: Highest price on the order book for buy orders not including pegged orders

best_static_bid_volume.title: Total volume at the best static bid price excluding pegged orders

best_static_offer_price.title: Lowest price on the order book for sell orders not including pegged orders

best_static_offer_volume.title: Total volume at the best static offer price excluding pegged orders

mid_price.title:
Arithmetic average of the best bid price and best offer price, as an integer, for example `123456` is a correctly
formatted price of `1.23456` assuming market configured to 5 decimal places

static_mid_price.title: Arithmetic average of the best static bid price and best static offer price

timestamp.title:
Timestamp at which this mark price was relevant, in nanoseconds since the epoch
- See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

open_interest.title: The sum of the size of all positions greater than 0 on the market

auction_end.title: Time in seconds until the end of the auction (0 if currently not in auction period)

auction_start.title: Time until next auction (used in FBA's) - currently always 0

indicative_price.title: Indicative price (zero if not in auction)

indicative_volume.title: Indicative volume (zero if not in auction)

market_trading_mode.title: The current trading mode for the market

trigger.title: When a market is in an auction trading mode, this field indicates what triggered the auction

extension_trigger.title: When a market auction is extended, this field indicates what caused the extension

target_stake.title: Targeted stake for the given market

supplied_stake.title: Available stake for the given market

price_monitoring_bounds.title: One or more price monitoring bounds for the current timestamp

liquidity_provider_fee_share.title: the equity like share of liquidity fee for each liquidity provider

vegaMarketData.title: Represents data generated by a market when open

vegaMarketState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value, invalid
 - STATE_PROPOSED: The Governance proposal valid and accepted
 - STATE_REJECTED: Outcome of governance votes is to reject the market
 - STATE_PENDING: Governance vote passes/wins
 - STATE_CANCELLED: Market triggers cancellation condition or governance
votes to close before market becomes Active
 - STATE_ACTIVE: Enactment date reached and usual auction exit checks pass
 - STATE_SUSPENDED: Price monitoring or liquidity monitoring trigger
 - STATE_CLOSED: Governance vote (to close)
 - STATE_TRADING_TERMINATED: Defined by the product (i.e. from a product parameter,
specified in market definition, giving close date/time)
 - STATE_SETTLED: Settlement triggered and completed as defined by product
vegaMarketState.title: The current state of the Market

proposed.title: Time when the market is first proposed

pending.title: Time when the market has been voted in and is created into an opening auction

open.title: Time when the market has left the opening auction and is ready to accept trades

close.title: Time when the market is closed

vegaMarketTimestamps.title: Time stamps for important times about creating, enacting etc the market

value.title: The value for the network parameter

vegaNetworkParameter.title: Represents a network parameter on Vega

changes.title: The configuration of the new asset

url.title: The URL containing content that describes the proposal

description.title: A short description of what is being proposed

hash.title: The hash on the content of the URL

changes.title: The configuration of the new market

liquidity_commitment.title: The commitment from the party creating the NewMarket proposal

commitment_amount.title: Specified as a unitless number that represents the amount of settlement asset of the market

fee.title: Nominated liquidity fee factor, which is an input to the calculation of taker fees on the market, as per seeting fees and rewarding liquidity providers

sells.title: A set of liquidity sell orders to meet the liquidity provision obligation

buys.title: A set of liquidity buy orders to meet the liquidity provision obligation

reference.title: A reference to be associated to all orders created from this commitment

vegaNewMarketCommitment.title: A commitment of liquidity to be made by the party which proposes a market

decimal_places.title: Decimal places used for the new market

metadata.title: Optional new market meta data, tags

simple.title: Simple risk model parameters, valid only if MODEL_SIMPLE is selected

log_normal.title: Log normal risk model parameters, valid only if MODEL_LOG_NORMAL is selected

vegaNewMarketConfiguration.title: Configuration for a new market on Vega

settlement_price_property.description:
settlement_price_property holds the name of the property in the oracle data
that should be used as settlement price.
If it is set to "prices.BTC.value", then the Future will use the value of
this property as settlement price.

trading_termination_property.title: the name of the property in the oracle data that signals termination of trading

vegaOracleSpecToFutureBinding.title:
OracleSpecToFutureBinding tells on which property oracle data should be
used as settlement price and which to use the trading terminated trigger

id.title: A unique identifier for the party, typically represented by a public key

vegaParty.title: A party represents an entity who wishes to trade on or query a Vega network

vegaPeggedReference.description:
- PEGGED_REFERENCE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value for PeggedReference, no reference given
 - PEGGED_REFERENCE_MID: Mid price reference
 - PEGGED_REFERENCE_BEST_BID: Best bid price reference
 - PEGGED_REFERENCE_BEST_ASK: Best ask price reference
vegaPeggedReference.title:
A pegged reference defines which price point a pegged order is linked to - meaning
the price for a pegged order is calculated from the value of the reference price point

min_valid_price.title: Minimum price that isn't currently breaching the specified price monitoring trigger

max_valid_price.title: Maximum price that isn't currently breaching the specified price monitoring trigger

trigger.title: Price monitoring trigger associated with the bounds

reference_price.title: Reference price used to calculate the valid price range

vegaPriceMonitoringBounds.title: Represents a list of valid (at the current timestamp) price ranges per associated trigger

vegaPriceMonitoringParameters.title: PriceMonitoringParameters contains a collection of triggers to be used for a given market

parameters.title: Specifies price monitoring parameters to be used for price monitoring purposes

update_frequency.title: Specifies how often (expressed in seconds) the price monitoring bounds should be updated

vegaPriceMonitoringSettings.title: PriceMonitoringSettings contains the settings for price monitoring

horizon.title: Price monitoring projection horizon  in seconds

auction_extension.title:
Price monitoring auction extension duration in seconds should the price
breach it's theoretical level over the specified horizon at the specified
probability level

vegaPriceMonitoringTrigger.title: PriceMonitoringTrigger holds together price projection horizon , probability level p, and auction extension duration

party_id.title: Party identifier of the author (the party submitting the proposal)

timestamp.title: Proposal timestamp for date and time (in nanoseconds) when proposal was submitted to the network

terms.title: Proposal configuration and the actual change that is meant to be executed when proposal is enacted

reason.title: A reason for the current state of the proposal, this may be set in case of REJECTED and FAILED statuses

error_details.description: The detailed error associated to the reason.

vegaProposalError.description:
- PROPOSAL_ERROR_UNSPECIFIED: Default value
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_CLOSE_TIME_TOO_SOON: The specified close time is too early base on network parameters
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_CLOSE_TIME_TOO_LATE: The specified close time is too late based on network parameters
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_ENACT_TIME_TOO_SOON: The specified enact time is too early based on network parameters
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_ENACT_TIME_TOO_LATE: The specified enact time is too late based on network parameters
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_TOKENS: The proposer for this proposal as insufficient tokens
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_INSTRUMENT_SECURITY: The instrument quote name and base name were the same
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NO_PRODUCT: The proposal has no product
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_PRODUCT: The specified product is not supported
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_FUTURE_PRODUCT_TIMESTAMP: Invalid future maturity timestamp (expect RFC3339)
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_PRODUCT_MATURITY_IS_PASSED: The product maturity is past
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NO_TRADING_MODE: The proposal has no trading mode
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_TRADING_MODE: The proposal has an unsupported trading mode
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NODE_VALIDATION_FAILED: The proposal failed node validation
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_MISSING_BUILTIN_ASSET_FIELD: A field is missing in a builtin asset source
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_MISSING_ERC20_CONTRACT_ADDRESS: The contract address is missing in the ERC20 asset source
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_ASSET: The asset identifier is invalid or does not exist on the Vega network
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INCOMPATIBLE_TIMESTAMPS: Proposal terms timestamps are not compatible (Validation < Closing < Enactment)
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NO_RISK_PARAMETERS: No risk parameters were specified
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NETWORK_PARAMETER_INVALID_KEY: Invalid key in update network parameter proposal
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NETWORK_PARAMETER_INVALID_VALUE: Invalid valid in update network parameter proposal
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_NETWORK_PARAMETER_VALIDATION_FAILED: Validation failed for network parameter proposal
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_OPENING_AUCTION_DURATION_TOO_SMALL: Opening auction duration is less than the network minimum opening auction time
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_OPENING_AUCTION_DURATION_TOO_LARGE: Opening auction duration is more than the network minimum opening auction time
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_MARKET_MISSING_LIQUIDITY_COMMITMENT: Market proposal is missing a liquidity commitment
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_COULD_NOT_INSTANTIATE_MARKET: Market proposal market could not be instantiate in execution
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_FUTURE_PRODUCT: Market proposal market contained invalid product definition
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_MISSING_COMMITMENT_AMOUNT: Market proposal is missing commitment amount
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_FEE_AMOUNT: Market proposal have invalid fee
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_SHAPE: Market proposal have invalid shape
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_RISK_PARAMETER: Market proposal invalid risk parameter
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_MAJORITY_THRESHOLD_NOT_REACHED: Proposal was declined because vote didn't reach the majority thershold required
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_PARTICIPATION_THRESHOLD_NOT_REACHED: Proposal declined because the participation threshold was not reached
 - PROPOSAL_ERROR_INVALID_ASSET_DETAILS: Asset proposal invalid asset details
vegaProposalError.title: A list of possible errors that can cause a proposal to be in state rejected or failed

vegaProposalState.description:
- STATE_UNSPECIFIED: Default value, always invalid
 - STATE_FAILED: Proposal enactment has failed - even though proposal has passed, its execution could not be performed
 - STATE_OPEN: Proposal is open for voting
 - STATE_PASSED: Proposal has gained enough support to be executed
 - STATE_REJECTED: Proposal wasn't accepted (proposal terms failed validation due to wrong configuration or failing to meet network requirements)
 - STATE_DECLINED: Proposal didn't get enough votes (either failing to gain required participation or majority level)
 - STATE_ENACTED: Proposal enacted
 - STATE_WAITING_FOR_NODE_VOTE: Waiting for node validation of the proposal
vegaProposalState.title:
Proposal state transition:
Open ->
  - Passed -> Enacted.
  - Passed -> Failed.
  - Declined
Rejected
Proposal can enter Failed state from any other state

closing_timestamp.title:
Timestamp (Unix time in seconds) when voting closes for this proposal,
constrained by `minClose` and `maxClose` network parameters

enactment_timestamp.title:
Timestamp (Unix time in seconds) when proposal gets enacted (if passed),
constrained by `minEnact` and `maxEnact` network parameters

update_market.title: Proposal change for modifying an existing market on Vega

new_market.title: Proposal change for creating new market on Vega

update_network_parameter.title: Proposal change for updating Vega network parameters

new_asset.title: Proposal change for creating new assets on Vega

new_freeform.title: Proposal change for a freeform voting thing

vegaProposalTerms.title: Terms for a governance proposal on Vega

vegaScalingFactors.title: Scaling Factors (for use in margin calculation)

factor_long.title: Pre-defined risk factor value for long

factor_short.title: Pre-defined risk factor value for short

max_move_up.title: Pre-defined maximum price move up that the model considers as valid

min_move_down.title: Pre-defined minimum price move down that the model considers as valid

vegaSimpleModelParams.title: Risk model parameters for simple modelling

params.title: Risk model params for simple modelling

time_window.title: Specifies length of time window expressed in seconds for target stake calculation

scaling_factor.title: Specifies scaling factors used in target stake calculation

vegaTargetStakeParameters.title: TargetStakeParameters contains parameters used in target stake calculation

vegaUpdateMarket.title: Update an existing market on Vega

proposal_id.title: Identifier of the proposal being voted on

timestamp.title: Vote timestamp for date and time (in nanoseconds) when vote was submitted to the network

total_governance_token_balance.title: Total number of governance token for the party that casted the vote

total_governance_token_weight.title: The weight of this vote based on the total of governance token
